pageProduct.name: Swisse Beauty Hyaluronic 2% Vitamin B5 Glow Booster Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Hyaluronic 2% Vitamin B5 Glow Booster Serum is a transformative formula, containing scientifically proven that boost & hydrate the skin for all-day glow. Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin B5 & Ceramides work to instantly enhance skin hydration for smoother, plumper, fresher complexion & the ultimate glow boost.

Swisse Hyaluronic 2% Vitamin B5 Glow Booster Serum is a transformative formula, containing scientifically proven that boost & hydrate the skin for all-day glow. Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin B5 & Ceramides work to instantly enhance skin hydration for smoother, plumper, fresher complexion & the ultimate glow boost.

Size: 30mL

Warnings

Test before use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner.

Ingredients

Water, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Coco-Caprylate, Glycerin (Plant Derived), PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Triticum Vulgare/Aestivum (Wheat) Grain Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Heptyl Undecylenate, C13-15 Alkane, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Disodium EDTA, Xanthan Gum, Heptyl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol.

Directions

Directions: For a transformative result, apply every morning and night to face, neck and decolletage after cleansing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 28°C.
